0.1.name: wordpress/delicious-curator
0.1.description:
Google Reader removed the ability to share links within Google Reader, and instead started using google+ for this. That is all well, but it made the plugin Shareditems2WP obsolete. But if you still want a way to create WordPress post based on one or more links that you shared from your RSS reader, you are in luck. Share the links to Delicious ("bookmark" them), tag them with something recognizable and use this plugin to generate the post.

The steps to take:

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Go to the settings page for the plugin and enter Delicious user name and what Delicious tag(s) to look for
  3. Design the post template. Relax, it's short, easy and there's a default template you can use.
  4. Share interesting stuff on Delicious
  5. Generate post (Press "Run now").
  6. The post is generated as a draft, edit and publish the post.
